attributes.action: I have a symptomatic Pineal Cyst 11mm big and belong to Facebook Pineal cyst Uk
attributes.background: People like me are getting no help from professionals there's a procedure called the Gamma Knife Surgery avaliable on the NHS so why are we not getting offered the choice for this  I have a 11yr old child to look after and my symptoms are getting worse I can't be the mum and partner I need to be,

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

We can only accept petitions that call for action from the UK Government. The UK Government is only responsible for health policy in England. You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to take a specific action, if you would like health policy to be changed in England. For example, you could ask for funding for Gamma Knife Surgery to be made available on the NHS.
